body.bibl: Dirksen, Piet B. “The Old Testament Peshitta.” In Mikra: Text, Translation, Reading and Interpretation of the Hebrew Bible in Ancient Judaism and Early Christianity, edited by Martin Jan Mulder, 255–97.
